description: Add or remove applications on a Webfaction host

machine.description: The machine name to use (optional for accounts with only one machine)

autostart.description: Whether the app should restart with an autostart.cgi script

type.description: The type of application to create. See the Webfaction docs at http://docs.webfaction.com/xmlrpc-api/apps.html for a list.

port_open.description: IF the port should be opened

extra_info.description: Any extra parameters required by the app
